biotools.summary: A network based statistical learning method to infer the putative functions of proteins from the known functions of its neighboring proteins on a PPI network. It identifies such proteins often involved in the same or similar biological functions.

bioschemas.name: PPInfer
bioschemas.summary: A network based statistical learning method to infer the putative functions of proteins from the known functions of its neighboring proteins on a PPI network. It identifies such proteins often involved in the same or similar biological functions.
